titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Advisory Council on Historic Preservation, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Advisory Council on Historic Preservation, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation for salaries and expenses.
